ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh, no doubt.  I tried to go to the king s room on E ci this weekend to get some greaves.  It was camped by Fubarrh, Bolenie Sandwich, and Ironhide. It
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh, no doubt. I tried to go to the king's room on E'ci this weekend to
get some greaves. It was camped by Fubarrh, Bolenie Sandwich, and Ironhide.
It was unbelievable. They were willing to let me get some greaves if they
got em, but their tactics were below questionable and we all watched as some
fool shaman tried to solo the ice giant diplomat. Worst thing was, it RAN
from him. Right over me, I went right between its legs. Needless to say
when it came back down the ramp it bought about 20 gobs with it killing
many, except the castes of course who simply gated. Didn't someone once
claim they were so frail they'd always be the first to go. The melee types
had zero chance of escape and the caster's had zero chance of death. And
they said Selo's was unbalancing in allowing train avoidance indoors? Yeah,
right. How fast travel can be unbalancing but instantaneous travelling is
not I fail to see.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 2:09 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> isn't possible at my level. There are no good weapons dropped that a
group
> of my level could get that a bard can use that are better than my dirk.
> Hmmm, maybe the dirk is the unbalanced part!


I'm telling you, put on a pretty face and beg in permafrost =)

I always had a soft spot for mini Harmonics running around, as
I too am a old hoot who remembers the hardships of those days.
I have a silvery war axe and another crystalline blade in the
bank, along with my old steel and charred. You should start
over on Innoruuk. <g>

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
